meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark Japinga Dawn Owens-Nicholson Ben Ingram Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6649.

div.div:
Ben Ingram game 9.
Mark Japinga game 1.

td.p: Mark Japinga, a legislative researcher from Washington, D.C.
Dawn Owens-Nicholson, a data and statistics consultant from Champaign, Illinois
Ben Ingram, an IT consultant originally from Florence, South Carolina (whose 8-day cash winnings total $176,534)

tr.td: WHERE AM I?
SET SAIL FOR THE MOVIES
WAR STORIES
POKER WORDS
THE LAW
GET YOUR "J.D."

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_5', 'clue_DJ_2_5_stuck', '(Dawn: Well, I might be crazy, but I\'m gonna bet $10,000.)
...
(Alex: Oh, Dawn...
You got it!)
(Dawn: Oh! Wow.)
(Alex: Way to go!
$21,800.)
(Dawn: I\'m crazy.)
(Alex: And you must forgive me. That might\'ve been interpreted as being cruel on my part, but I was just so delighted for you. Way to go.)

ruby

Dawn
')
